steps.description: Step 1: Navigate to Excel Web - Ensure we're on Excel Web with authentication - The synthetic UX designer navigated to Excel Web interface and completed authentication. The designer observed the interface loading process, authentication flow, and initial state of the Excel Web environment. The designer noted the responsiveness of the navigation and any visual inconsistencies during the loading process.

Step 2: Click New Workbook - Click the 'Blank workbook' text to create a new workbook - The designer clicked on the 'Blank workbook' option to create a new Excel document. The designer observed the transition between the selection interface and the new workbook environment, noting the smoothness of the transition and any unexpected behaviors during the workbook creation process.

steps.step_name: Wait for Excel to Launch in New Window
steps.description: Step 3: Wait for Excel to Launch in New Window - Wait for Excel to launch in new window after clicking 'Blank workbook' - The designer waited for Excel to fully launch in a new window or iframe. During this waiting period, the designer observed the loading animations, interface initialization, and the time taken for the interface to become fully interactive. The designer noted any performance issues or visual glitches during the loading process.

Step 4: Take Screenshot - Copilot Dialog - Capture the Copilot dialog before dismissing it - An unwanted Copilot dialog appeared unexpectedly during the workflow. The designer had to manually dismiss this dialog to continue with the intended task. The designer observed the dialog's appearance timing, dismissal mechanism, and the disruption it caused to the natural workflow progression.

Step 5: Dismiss Copilot Dialog - Dismiss the 'Start with Copilot' dialog that appears when creating a new workbook - An unwanted Copilot dialog appeared unexpectedly during the workflow. The designer had to manually dismiss this dialog to continue with the intended task. The designer observed the dialog's appearance timing, dismissal mechanism, and the disruption it caused to the natural workflow progression.

Step 6: Take Screenshot - Initial State - Capture initial workbook state - The designer captured a screenshot for visual analysis and documentation purposes. The designer observed the quality and completeness of the captured visual state, noting any rendering issues or visual inconsistencies that might affect user perception of the interface.

Step 7: Enter Sample Data - Enter sample data in cells using canvas approach - The designer entered sample data into Excel cells using various input methods. The designer observed the responsiveness of the data entry process, visual feedback provided by the interface, and any issues with cell selection or text input functionality.

Step 8: Take Screenshot - Data Entered - Capture workbook with data entered - The designer captured a screenshot for visual analysis and documentation purposes. The designer observed the quality and completeness of the captured visual state, noting any rendering issues or visual inconsistencies that might affect user perception of the interface.

Step 9: Click Save Button - Click the save button to save the workbook - The designer clicked the save button to save the current workbook. The designer observed the save workflow, any dialogs that appeared during the save process, and the overall user experience during this critical operation. The designer noted the clarity of save status indicators and any unexpected interruptions.

Step 10: Take Screenshot - Final State - Capture final workbook state after save - The designer captured a screenshot for visual analysis and documentation purposes. The designer observed the quality and completeness of the captured visual state, noting any rendering issues or visual inconsistencies that might affect user perception of the interface.

base_craft_bugs.title: Multiple Dialog Interruptions
base_craft_bugs.description: Scenario was interrupted by 2 dialogs, creating a fragmented user experience
base_craft_bugs.recommendation: Minimize dialog interruptions and implement smoother workflow transitions

base_craft_bugs.title: Scenario Reliability Issues
base_craft_bugs.description: 10 steps failed during execution, indicating workflow reliability problems
base_craft_bugs.recommendation: Improve scenario reliability through better error handling and robust step implementation

enhanced_craft_bugs.title: LLM Detected: Misaligned Save Button
enhanced_craft_bugs.description: Save button is misaligned, leading to uneven spacing. when viewing the interface. Expected: Save button aligned horizontally with Cancel button.
enhanced_craft_bugs.what_wrong: Save button is misaligned, leading to uneven spacing.
enhanced_craft_bugs.expected: Save button aligned horizontally with Cancel button.
enhanced_craft_bugs.impact: Creates a perception of inconsistency and may confuse users.
enhanced_craft_bugs.visual_measurement: Save button is misaligned, leading to uneven spacing.
enhanced_craft_bugs.expected_result: Save button aligned horizontally with Cancel button.
enhanced_craft_bugs.actual_result: Save button is misaligned, leading to uneven spacing.
enhanced_craft_bugs.immediate_fix: Adjust the margin to ensure both buttons are evenly aligned.
enhanced_craft_bugs.visual_target: Save button aligned horizontally with Cancel button.

enhanced_craft_bugs.title: LLM Detected: Poor Color Contrast
enhanced_craft_bugs.description: Save button text color (#CCCCCC) on background color (#F5F5F5) has insufficient contrast. when viewing the interface. Expected: Minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1 between text and background.
enhanced_craft_bugs.what_wrong: Save button text color (#CCCCCC) on background color (#F5F5F5) has insufficient contrast.
enhanced_craft_bugs.expected: Minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1 between text and background.
enhanced_craft_bugs.impact: Users with vision impairments may struggle to read text.
enhanced_craft_bugs.visual_measurement: Save button text color (#CCCCCC) on background color (#F5F5F5) has insufficient contrast.
enhanced_craft_bugs.expected_result: Minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1 between text and background.
enhanced_craft_bugs.actual_result: Save button text color (#CCCCCC) on background color (#F5F5F5) has insufficient contrast.
enhanced_craft_bugs.immediate_fix: Change text color to #333333 for improved contrast.
enhanced_craft_bugs.visual_target: Minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1 between text and background.

enhanced_craft_bugs.title: LLM Detected: Unclear Save Button Affordance
enhanced_craft_bugs.description: No visual feedback provided upon hover. when viewing the interface. Expected: Save button should have a highlighted state on hover.
enhanced_craft_bugs.what_wrong: No visual feedback provided upon hover.
enhanced_craft_bugs.expected: Save button should have a highlighted state on hover.
enhanced_craft_bugs.impact: Users cannot easily determine if the button is interactable.
enhanced_craft_bugs.visual_measurement: No visual feedback provided upon hover.
enhanced_craft_bugs.expected_result: Save button should have a highlighted state on hover.
enhanced_craft_bugs.actual_result: No visual feedback provided upon hover.
enhanced_craft_bugs.immediate_fix: Implement a hover state with a color change or shadow effect.
enhanced_craft_bugs.visual_target: Save button should have a highlighted state on hover.

enhanced_craft_bugs.title: LLM Detected: Inconsistent Button Styles
enhanced_craft_bugs.description: Save button has a different border radius compared to other buttons. when viewing the interface. Expected: All primary buttons should follow a consistent design language.
enhanced_craft_bugs.what_wrong: Save button has a different border radius compared to other buttons.
enhanced_craft_bugs.expected: All primary buttons should follow a consistent design language.
enhanced_craft_bugs.impact: Reduces visual consistency and may confuse users about button importance.
enhanced_craft_bugs.visual_measurement: Save button has a different border radius compared to other buttons.
enhanced_craft_bugs.expected_result: All primary buttons should follow a consistent design language.
enhanced_craft_bugs.actual_result: Save button has a different border radius compared to other buttons.
enhanced_craft_bugs.immediate_fix: Apply a uniform border radius across all buttons for consistency.
enhanced_craft_bugs.visual_target: All primary buttons should follow a consistent design language.
